ai-patthana15.15:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.15:0.3_0: he turns back to the seventh patience.
ai-patthana15.15:1.1_0: Because of wrong understanding, causes and reasons not for the sake of wrong understanding.
ai-patthana15.15:2.1_0: But it’s not possible for the sake of unconfused mind.
ai-patthana15.15:3.1_0: for the sake of not for the sake of unconfused Teaching, not for the sake of a cause. ...
ai-patthana15.15:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
